entries.name: expire
entries.desc: Time in seconds that a secondary name server is to use the data before refreshing from the primary name server.

entries.name: minimum
entries.desc: The minimum number of seconds to be used for TTL values in RRs.

entries.name: mname
entries.desc: Name of the host where the master zone file for this zone resides.

entries.name: refresh
entries.desc: How often, in seconds, a secondary name server is to check for updates from the primary name server.

entries.name: retry
entries.desc: How often, in seconds, a secondary name server is to retry after a failure to check for a refresh.

entries.name: rname
entries.desc: The person responsible for this domain name.

entries.name: serial
entries.desc: The version number of the zone file.

entries.name: new(mname, rname, serial, refresh, retry_, expire, minimum)
entries.desc: Creates a new SOA record.  See the attr documentation for the details of each argument.
